title: When the jungler randomly starts farming in your lane while you are in it.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Valaran Nara,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0La3Wkah,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-15T15:06:37.271+0000)
>
> http://s6.pikabu.ru/post_img/2014/04/20/5/1397973097_674504876.gif

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11119/111194392/4311995-2698838531-tumbl.gif

Its because this is what it feels like when you are a jungler and they have 50 more cs than you. And you are walking by their lane.

https://media2.giphy.com/media/q01WJwWC2yR1u/200.gif
Sure, they may have eaten 80 chicken wings, but you got 30 chicken breasts.
mmmmm chicken breasts grgragragr

> [{quoted}](name=Zitoshi,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0La3Wkah,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-15T15:45:49.756+0000)
>
> Its because this is what it feels like when you are a jungler and they have 50 more cs than you. And you are walking by their lane.
> 
> https://media2.giphy.com/media/q01WJwWC2yR1u/200.gif

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

[http://www.searchquotes.com/sof/images/user/89275_20130320_101920_funny-can-I-help-you-computer.jpg](http://www.searchquotes.com/sof/images/user/89275_20130320_101920_funny-can-I-help-you-computer.jpg)

Kinda feels like that
{{champion:75}} : Get the **FUCK** off my stacks!
Jungle nasus has the right to farm in your lane
Only champions and cannons though. +6
I read this in the sassiest voice so I logged in to upvote.
too many times has the jg stolen my stacks as {{champion:75}}
Trump 2016! Build the wall. Deport them all!
The fact I misread your name as "Malicious Furry" makes this post even more hilarious to me.
Lol, build wall so U.S. can declare bankruptcy. New OP strat. Dumbest idea ever from a fiscally conservative point of view.

The US pay for the wall?! No way Jose! (kek, Jose) You aren't up to date with things.

Make [THEM](https://www.donaldjtrump.com/positions/pay-for-the-wall) pay for it!

Lol yeah I'm assuming you're meming here. If not then {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} study economics. Saying something and it being done are two different things and Mexico has stated they aren't paying for any wall, let alone paying for any up keep for the thing. Oh also there are these new inventions called boats, they go around the wall pretty easy, and tunnels (they go under the wall pretty easy). Lol. Might as well promise unicorns as a campaign platform. Then at least it is more obvious why everyone is laughing at the people who say "I'm voting for X bc he promised me unicorns."
http://lolworthy.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/trump-building-wall-gif.gif
Omg this is beautiful. That made me laugh so hard. Oh god the animation is so bad and it's just so funny and thank you. I needed that laugh.
NOW you get the point! ^_^
#MakeShurimaGreatAgain         {{champion:268}} {{summoner:21}}

http://i.imgur.com/MWBJsLG.jpg

This explains my reaction perfectly, they have fresh jungle camps and they just wander into lane like they left their phone.

You have lane farm, but laners dont seem to mind taking my camps either, even though i actually get more gold and experience than they do for it. Better yet, some ADCs will just last hit the camps from you as you do it.
but that's adcs though, they're like hard programmed to steal farm
"Steal" implies they aren't entitled to all farm in the game.
And when they ask for a gank after doing this... Mmmmmmm
Yell and flame you for not ganking*
They're taxing it obviously! It's just, without the ganking part.

Jungler role is the worst and gets even more flame than support because u have to babysit 3 lanes at once while counter jungling and farming your own jungle and also solo drake and rift herald.
I don't get how mid and top gets to feed so bad some games

> [{quoted}](name=kuzzy47,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0La3Wkah,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-05-15T18:10:20.846+0000)
>
> Jungler role is the worst and gets even more flame than support because u have to babysit 3 lanes at once while counter jungling and farming your own jungle and also solo drake and rift herald.
> I don't get how mid and top gets to feed so bad some games

Because you actually have to lane against someone, instead of getting to cherry pick where you attack while you free farm and drop a few wards to prevent invades.  

Having every micro decision you make count is hard sometimes if the other person is a lot better than you.

> [{quoted}](name=Mike17032,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0La3Wkah,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-05-15T20:31:55.500+0000)
>
> Because you actually have to lane against someone, instead of getting to cherry pick where you attack while you free farm and drop a few wards to prevent invades.  
> 
> Having every micro decision you make count is hard sometimes if the other person is a lot better than you.

It's not as easy as you make it sound, jungling its more about decision making.Laning can be stressful against a superior opponent but at my level people tend to worsen the situation.In a game where all lanes are losing it puts a lot of pressure on the jungler.
i love jg, i cant lane cus im wayyyy too aggro and dive wen i shouldent and i cant cs fo shit. Only lane i can semi play is adc with aggro support
The jungler shaming has been real recently.

> [{quoted}](name=DexterousGecko,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0La3Wkah,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-15T16:18:58.669+0000)
>
> The jungler shaming has been real recently.

Im a Top/JUngle main :P so i can shame my own kind.
Funny thing is if someone made a gif pertaining to "When a laner takes your wolves or raptors even though you are literally within screen distance of them", itd be downvoted.
I had my mid laner do that to my 2nd blue buff after the enemy udyr just took my red...I was playing Elise.
As a jungler I refuse to farm a lane unless I need to defend tower. I should have no need to take lane gold away from someone when I have a whole jungle for the picking.
I farm to keep pressure on the lane until the laner gets back. I also freeze for laners

Eh, it depends. If a gank works and shoving lane is a good idea then we should do it. Also if it's a jungle match up where lvl 6 is key I may steal some extra lane tax to hit 6 early and try to snowball bot lane w/ ult or countergank w/ lvl 6 advantage and snowball jungle+a lane. Hell, you could justify stealing some random lane tax to get lvl advantage and invade to kill enemy jg w/ that advantage if the match up was right.

PS no tax is as dirty as the exp tax mid if you clear raptors by moving as close to mid lane as possible in their little corner and leeching a bit of exp range (it is just barely in range to share xp depending on where the lane is if you're against the wall as close to lane as possible while you clear).
Azir: now builds walls using your creeps.
LOL

I've been having the opposite problem lately. My top laner takes krugs, my adc/support take gromp, my mid take wolves/raptors, then wonder why I'm so behind. Like where am I supposed to farm? the 10/0 {{champion:77}} jungle?

I'm having family issues right now which is really causing me to be stressed out.

Thank you for making me smile. 

+1

Im 100% ok with anyone farming in my lane even when im adc.

it allows my jungler, support or mid to gain a quick buck so they can B for the {{item:3009}} {{item:3092}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3285}} {{item:1400}}.

The game has gotten easier to catch up anyway so I dont really care aslong as i get my share of the.

IDGAF
its called taxing, i get a cannon and u get a gank , successful or not u signed the contract when u asked for a gank, gotta read that fine print
That's not how it works. You get paid for doing your job, not just for showing up to it.
Nah man, it's like a loan, we don't care how you use what we give you...but you gon give it back and some more one way or another.
No, that's still not how it works. You don't tax if your presence didn't accomplish anything. It's no trouble at all to walk back to whatever jungle camp is nearest the lane you just failed to gank.
You're assumption is based on it being OUR fault the laner didn't die. What if it's their fault? Then you've wasted our time for nothing.

And you're assuming that it's the laner's fault entirely. It was a combined failure, and so a combined failed gank where both parties need to go back to what they were doing beforehand. Even if they didn't die, you pushed them away long enough to give yourself some space to breathe while farming jungle instead of hindering the team as a whole by stealing farm and giving all three of you less EXP for the time, _as well as_ preventing yourself from ganking them and them from farming for even longer than the time you're just there taking farm, since the lane will be pushed.
